name: Pesto Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1 whole bulb garlic, the cloves separated, peeled and smashed
1/2 cup chicken broth, prepared by any standard recipe, or canned
1/2 teaspoon kosher salt (optional; skip if using canned broth)

recipeInstructions.text: Place garlic and broth in a 4-cup glass measure. Cover tightly with microwave plastic wrap. Cook at 100 percent power for 8 minutes (15 minutes in a small oven).

Remove from the oven. Pierce plastic with tip of a small knife to release steam, then carefully remove plastic. Scrape mixture into a blender. Blend until smooth. With motor running, add the basil, then the oil and, if desired, salt. Blend well.
